p: Cai et al. [ 137] applied MDGC-MS/O to analyse the ladybugâ€™s ( Harmonia axyridis) smell in vivo. MDGC improved the separation and evaluation of the main odour impact compounds, related to four pyrazines: 2,5-dimethyl-3-methoxypyrazine, 2-isopropyl-3-methoxypyrazine, 2- sec-butyl-3-methoxypyrazine and 2-isobutyl-3-methoxypyrazine.
